Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-la
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: lemela’ikitimi le’ademi sigedu balinachewi gize (yehonewini asitawisi)፡፡ wediyawimi segedu፤ ibilisi bicha sik’eri፡፡ keganeni (gosa) neberi፡፡ kegetawimi ti’izazi wet’a፡፡ irisunina zerochuni inerisu le’inanite t’elatochi sihonu ke’ine layi redatochi adirigachihu tiyizalachihuni lebedayochi liwach’inetu kefa
yesemayatinina yemidirini afet’at’eri alasayehwachewimi፡፡ yenefisochachewinimi afet’at’eri (inidezihu)፡፡ asasachochinimi redatochi adirige yemiyizi ayidelehumi፡፡
«ineziyanimi (amilaki) yemitilwachewini tegariwocheni t’iru» yemilibetini k’eni (asitawisi)፡፡ yit’erwachewalimi gini ayimelisulachewimi፡፡ bemekakelachewimi met’ifiyani sifira (gehanemini) aderegini፡፡
kehadiwochimi isatini yayalu፡፡ inerisumi bewisit’wa wedak’iwochi mehonachewini yaregagit’alu፡፡ ke’iriswami mesheshani ayagenyumi፡፡
